website_summaries.verdict: Gorgeous dark chocolate truffles with rich, bold flavors. When milk chocolate just won't do, this Godiva collection is the one to get.
pros: Offers the quality expected of Godiva in dark chocolate
Includes a variety of eye-catching designs and 9 tasty varieties
cons: A few boxes contained truffles that looked or tasted stale
On the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: They were all so disappointed when she opened them
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves these chocolates, so I ordered her some for Mothers's Day. My sister took delivery directly from the UPS driver, and kept them in the refrigerator before giving them to my mom today. They were all so disappointed when she opened them, as you can see from the picture, they are completely melted and ruined. Amazon refunded my money, but I would not buy these again from Godiva in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Stale. Not up to Godiva's standards
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment. I have always loved Godiva dark chocolate-especially the truffles. While I have received these as gifts, I have also purchased for myself. Have never had a complaint-until now. These were stale. They did not melt in my mouth as it always had. The picture shows the truffle after being bit into. My past experience has been biting into a Godiva chocolate is NOT a breaking up bite, but a soft, smooth melting bite with both the outer chocolate and the soft insides coming together. These broke the outer chocolate and, believe, me it tasted like they had been sitting in a store window for six months--Godiva would be appalled. Will not purchase from any where but Godiva.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.text: So I love Godiva chocolate. Love. I bought these as a treat for myself. Skillfully hid the box from my children when they were delivered today. Could not wait for them to get in bed fast enough. Open them up...and they all have that white weird coating that is on "old" chocolate. Ok...well they aren't expired yet according to the box. So I pull out the raspberry one. I've had this several times. It was so bad I had to spit it out. I'm so sad b/c I was looking forward to me and my chocolates tonight :( Amazon customer service was great and I'm getting a refund. But I need to toss these.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Lover

customer_reviews.title: Plastic after taste.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this was going to be good. Our Godiva store closed years ago. I would buy chocolates from them for my wife regularly. For majority of my life I did not like chocolate. That changed when I tried a Godiva truffle. I realized I liked fine chocolates. This tastes nothing like them. They actually had an unusual after taste that I could best describe as plastic. Unfortunately Mercy chocolates that I bought at Walgreens tastes much better. Beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my parents for christmas and my dad said they all were melted. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LauraLynn128

customer_reviews.title: Gift Greeting/ Bad
customer_reviews.text: Love the Product, Amazon needs to do better with the Gift Greeting, Its so tiny that most people never see it, I have to call them to see if they got it and then they say we dint know who sent it. Just saying the gift greeting does not do the job ?
customer_reviews.author: Harold A Graper

customer_reviews.title: All Dark and All Delicious Indulgences
customer_reviews.text: Excellent selection of dark chocolate Godiva truffles. There are two of each. The Aztec Spice is a wonderful surprise. Treating yourself or presenting as a gift, it is beautifully wrapped with a guide to the truffles included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Godiva drives off the beaten path - if you are adventurous, this is for you, but it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: Some odd choices of flavors in this. I purchased these for my husband who loves dark chocolate, but unfortunately I didn't know that there were some weird flavor combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: See inside
customer_reviews.text: Apparently not as good as German chocolate, so I heard. I did not sample any myself. It was dropshipped from PA., and came with two Godiva-branded freeze bags, and the bottom of the box said expires in April 2019 (as seen May 2018)).
customer_reviews.author: Triplefault

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I found this one from Godiva website and I decided buy this item so I ordered one from Amazon but, it looks really different.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: so last year one of my sisters sent this godiva box to me. it was very cold and fresh. So I just sent it to myself and to another sister for her birthday. they both arrived to us today in different states. The product came with soggy ice packs. The exterior of the truffles were stale!!! The interior was okay. I am ashamed that I bought this for my sister's birthday and that she got this distasteful yucky product. i can't believe that Godiva would allow the quality of their product to be this bad. And I'm shocked that Amazon would let this happen too.
customer_reviews.author: marie bertille donohoe

customer_reviews.title: Not what was delivered
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had ordered this box of truffles but what was delivered turned out to be a box of rather small chocolates. It was a Valentine's Day gift for my wife and we both were a little disappointed when she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: H. B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED PERFECT IN 103 DEGREES!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews of those who had issues with the item arriving melted and damaged concerned me, but Amazon standing behind everything they ship I decided to take a chance. The box arrived with a cooler that fit perfectly into it and was packed with 3 giant size ice packs still solidly frozen in 103 degrees (Phoenix heat). The chocolate was wrapped within and shrink wrapped. Wonderful experience and fantastic price. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: royalteelabs

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have had Godiva chocolate before, and I was never really impressed with the value. I ordered four of these for Easter as gifts (one went to us). Every was very happy with the gifts, and we really enjoyed the chocolates. They were all very good, with the possible exception being the key lime.
customer_reviews.author: bassguitarman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These may seem a little pricey, but once you taste them you will know the difference. If you don’t like chocolate, this little box of joy is not for you...go get some skittles or something. I ordered this in the winter when it wasn’t like 115 degrees outside and was happy when they arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: ABrown

customer_reviews.title: very expensive but,
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my partner for early valentine's gift. He really enjoyed them. however the cost for the product is not idea for what you get.. he is very happy with them though. a decent assortment of flavors for any occasion or a great way to say, "I'm sorry" if you do something wrong, ha-ha. however I think the price should be reduced about 20% considering it's not 48. but 24.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: where's the bow ?
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Godiva products ... mostly what's on the INSIDE of the package. purchased these as gifts but one box arrived without the ribbon. So will have to explain what happened to the bow unfortunately. somewhat of a Holiday Bummer !
customer_reviews.author: Javis Swanson

customer_reviews.title: No Nuts!!!! Peanut allergy friendly
customer_reviews.text: Its godiva; it can't be that bad. You get 2 each of the 12 different flavors in the box. I would buy it again. It comes with a list of all thier different flavors, so it can take some figuring out what is what. But the markings on each chocolate make it easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Less than perfect presentation...but still Satisfied the need for Chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time I ordered this item and 2 of the truffles appeared melted. Look like they were put in the box while the chocolate center was cooling. My friends n I will continue to purchase this item even though we decided not to eat the 2 truffles that looked like the had been handled. The remaining truffles were blissful as usual and no one got sick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: I like the package; however, chocolates weren't fresh at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Bashir

customer_reviews.title: No Big deal
customer_reviews.text: Godiva's name precedes their quality. I spent a lot on gifts with this small box of "standard" chocolates. Lindts or even Ferrer Roche are more enjoyable: there is nothing amazing about the taste of these chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: MJames

customer_reviews.title: Always consistently great chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Always great chocolate. A perfect gift that won’t disappoint. Admittedly I still like the classic Whitman’s Sampler and Russel Stover Chocolates too but these are special treats.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Want to bring a smile to mom's face?
customer_reviews.text: These chocolates (and other assortments from Godiva) light up my 92-year-old mother's face. She carefully metes out 4 a day. It keeps her going for sure. Amazon's prime offering makes it a valuable way to order when out-of-state.
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: High quality, decadent chocolates.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a birthday gift and right off the bat was so impressed that it was shipped with cooling packs to protect it from the Summer heat! I bought some Kit Kats and they weren’t packed the same way and they came all melted together in a lump. I guess there’s a difference in the quality of what you buy. The Godiva chocolate was excellent. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Chocolates!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious as always! She loved them. Great gift for that "special someone"! This is the 3rd or 4th time I've ordered these chocolates & I've never had a problem. Always fresh & delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Godiva is the perfect sweet treat for someone you really love
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get this for myself but was given the chance to try one. Wow.. great flavor and very rich.
customer_reviews.author: uuklangerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Ad says "2 boxes". Not so!!! It was a gift too. (:
customer_reviews.text: The ad for this says "2 boxes". Only received 1 box. When I reread the ad, I believe this was deliberately misleading. This was a gift, and I was not happy about this snafu.
customer_reviews.author: Choosehappy

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dark chocolate truffles I have ever had. Beautiful and generous. Price is high but the quality and taste make it worth it. Not your basic valentine candy.
customer_reviews.author: jessica chaos

customer_reviews.title: Godiva Dark Choc Truffles - Need I say more???
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful truffles delivered to me a couple days earlier than expected. A dream come true during this trying times.. Thanks so much! I actually saved $1.00 from the cost on the Godiva website..
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Sutton

customer_reviews.title: A bit odd...mice in the warehouse?
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived like mice had been eating it. Not sure of warehouse it was stored in, but ruined giftability and value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Classy
customer_reviews.text: Simple variety of Godiva chocolates. Perfect for the loved one who is watching his/her waistline yet likes to indulge every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: Late and melted mess
customer_reviews.text: Arrived two weeks late and had melted into a solid messy brick of chocolate. A disappointing gift for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Starligh06

customer_reviews.title: Total meltdown.
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate melted to puddle. No ice in package as mentioned. Delicious but not giftable. My mom and I laughed when we opened such an expensive box of chocolate. She said, “yep, money wasted!”. I agree.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Rickansrud

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a gift for someone who loves chocolate, they will thank you forever if you give them a box of these. Truly luscious. A chocoholic’s dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this several times. The quality is good and my wife likes them
customer_reviews.author: S. Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved These! Awesome to be able to only have Dark Chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tempted to buy more
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite. I think this is the third box I have purchased because the price has been lowered.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Most appreciated!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these not for me, but for someone very dear to me and she thoroughly enjoyed them. Arrived in good order. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Kober

customer_reviews.title: Rotted chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate was old, with white-ish rot all over. Had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Only received one box. Was not protected against the heat. Talked with amazon for three hours. Still had to pay for it again and wait for credit. I will be contacting Godiva.
customer_reviews.author: Dina L. Wisecup

customer_reviews.title: If you like Dark Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked them alot. Great as a gift or as a special treat.
customer_reviews.author: William Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Great Chocolates
customer_reviews.text: Well, c'mon, it's Godiva for goodness sake. The chocolates arrived in perfect condition with reusable cooling packs. The chocolates didn't last very long because I ate them.
customer_reviews.author: Garbo9000

customer_reviews.title: Big variety.
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety it comes with. Very delicious, one of my favorite chocolates. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy klymenko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent truffles and packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, high-quality truffles!!! In addition, during the hot summer months, they packaged these truffles in ice. The truffles were both fresh and cold. These are the best dark chocolate truffles I have tasted.
customer_reviews.author: EnviroDoc1

customer_reviews.title: "Old" chocolates.....Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates were coated white as if they were very old.... The flavor was not creamy as you would expect from Godiva Certainly not worth the price! Very disappointed with my purchase . Thank goodness I did not send them to a friend.... Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Sandra V Maury

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Gave 1 as gift kept the other very good chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy easter chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, delicious truffles. Yum fast delivery before Easter. Thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Blodwynn

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves Godiva dark chocolate
customer_reviews.text: She was really pleased with this gift. Arrived in great condition. No problems or issues.
customer_reviews.author: McMike

customer_reviews.title: Dark Chocolate is King! :)
customer_reviews.text: What a treat and Amazon is the way to buy them! The Godiva site plays a ton of games with pricing and shipping-forget that! Amazon and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Coleman

customer_reviews.title: It’s chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get to eat any but I’ve eaten them before. Overpriced chocolate but wouldn’t hesitate to buy them again for my sweetheart.
customer_reviews.author: megatron113

customer_reviews.title: Yummy dark chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for Mother's Day. Glad she let me have one.
customer_reviews.author: dennisinseattle

customer_reviews.title: Good Chocolate, Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: Presentation of the chocolate could have been better. But my girlfriend loves dark chocolate and was pleased with the variety, even though it was a guessing game of which chocolate was which.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: If you love chocolate truffles, this is the box to get!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Miller

customer_reviews.title: The driver alaways rang before.
customer_reviews.text: The package was left on the driveway, not even at the door while the temperature was in the upper 80-s. The driver did not ring the bell that the package was delivered. The recipient was home! The chocolate was melted out of form. It is especially embarrassing because it was a special gift.
customer_reviews.author: Attila E Pavlath

customer_reviews.title: I bought more than one. Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one as a gift. Tasted one and then bought another box for myself. Really good
customer_reviews.author: Nick bell

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: ordered for me Love dark chocolate once in awhile. And only once in awhile. So this is a good size will last awhile for me. If my husband doesn't eat them all.
customer_reviews.author: Camille V.Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: The care taken to deliver this on a 90F New York “spring” day is outstanding. Packed with ice, it was delivered at a perfect cool temperature. The chocolate is beautiful and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Pea-tear Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you like melted
customer_reviews.text: Came melted!!! All the truffles were melted and nasty ruined the gift
customer_reviews.author: BOURGEOISLSU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good of-course but I have to mention the effort on delivery package on the next level. The package was cooled for transportation. I have never seen this much care put in by any other company.
customer_reviews.author: oneiroi

customer_reviews.title: Too old
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and truffles, but these were stale.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best chocolates
customer_reviews.text: You can't do better than Godiva chocolates, and these were at the right price
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it, loved me and thus I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kozmo5759

customer_reviews.title: Burned twice, shame on me
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one box for my mom and one for my family. The chocolate may be okay to eat BUT at this price there should be no question
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Delicious buy
customer_reviews.text: Damned good. I got this for my grandmother during Christmas and she loved getting this! Delightful dark chocolates hiding wondering flavors which will be enough to make anyone smile. A but pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Gift Box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift, and it was well received. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica White

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom for mother's day and she loves them. Last I checked she's still working on eating them because they are so rich and decadent. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Teasdale

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved them
customer_reviews.text: They were a Valentine’s Day gift for mom. She was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved them, only issue that I had was that ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved them, only issue that I had was that there was no map of which truffles were where in the box. they stated how many of each but did not identify which ones were or where they were located in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Don Coulombe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great, taste great, ship chilled. A bit pricey, but worth it. A great gift for the chocolate lover.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: So tasty, I loved the variety. A little pricey, but a fun treat for a special occasion
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t any better than normal high quality chocolate and really pricy. You’re clearly just paying for the name.
customer_reviews.author: L. Trees

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: These were stale. Not Godiva quality. Every single flavor was stale-hard outside and not that delicious buttery soft inside. E.g. the ganache was pasty.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: It came all melted. Do I get reimbursed for this?
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate came all melted and does not look like in the picture at all. I was not thinking of that when I placed an order for this. So I did not get a taste of it at all. I bought this as a gift for a colleague but she returned it to me. What a bumper!!
customer_reviews.author: Khan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, delivered in a refigerated box. This is a must try for chocolate lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Melted chocolates.
customer_reviews.text: The chocolates were a Mother's day gift. They arrived melted. My wife was pleased with the idea of the gift but very dissatisfied with how poor they appeared.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Godiva Seems Overrated to me
customer_reviews.text: They were alright. I must be missing something, because I do not find them delicious as some do. Tbh I think they are more of a status symbol than a flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Rooby

customer_reviews.title: Godiva.......what’s not to love? ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition for Valentines Day, would order again
customer_reviews.author: Funtoes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These chocolates are great especially as a part of a six year anniversary gift.
customer_reviews.author: Macfixit4u

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as V-Day gift. The recipient enjoyed them, but stated they didn’t feel they were worth the amount I paid.
customer_reviews.author: PRBogey

customer_reviews.title: These chocolates arrived with a white haze over them. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: These chocolates arrived with a white haze over them. Oh yeah, and they are not returnable!. Always check return policy.
customer_reviews.author: RMS1

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best chocolate one can buy at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best chocolate one can buy at this price point. Rich, creamy and totally decadent. Give me more, more, more!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Friend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend who'd just had a knee replacement
customer_reviews.author: Janice VanDine

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates were good, but seemed a bit old
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates were good, but seemed a bit old. Or maybe they were just exposed to too much heat in shipment. The taste was fine, but some of the chocolates had white powder around them showing their age.
customer_reviews.author: Seth D Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Godiva Dark Chocolate Truffles
customer_reviews.text: Godiva are very good chocolates and this was given as a gift and much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: If this is a gift, be aware their name will be on the outside of the box when it arrives :(
customer_reviews.text: Godiva is always great but wish they didn't print their name on the shipping box... My wife was happy either way... but I would have rather it been a secret.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Eric G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were very good but way too expensive for anything but a one time try or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and texture. Packaged in a Styrofoam box with ice packs to keep it from melting.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mmmmmm, Godiva Dark Chocos! They need no review. They speak for themselves. :)
customer_reviews.author: N.M.

customer_reviews.title: Old and dry, throwing it out
customer_reviews.text: Old dry candy that should have been thrown out. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Delectably delicious dark chocolate! Yummmmm!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat Godiva for the serious chocolate connoisseur! Especially these delectable dark chocolate truffles. Treat your sweetie like I did and she'll be forever grateful!
customer_reviews.author: sirius1nWA

customer_reviews.title: Arrived melted
customer_reviews.text: Arrived completely melted, nothing to help preserve the temperature of the chocolates in the packaging at all. If this were a gift I would be embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Godiva Dark Chocolate truffles 100% delicious!
customer_reviews.text: We buy these truffles because we believe & know from eating them that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my Wife and she is really digging them
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Truffles arrived in perfect condition and beautifully packaged. Made a perfect gift for my dark chocolate loving sister.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Delivered melted
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this was an Easter got for my Mom. While Godiva is her favorite chocolate, she was unable to eat as it had melted in transit....:(
customer_reviews.author: Traci B. Owens

customer_reviews.title: IT COULDN'T BE BETTER1
customer_reviews.text: The truffles were shipped in a iced container and all was excellent. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The product was very well made. The shipping was also whipped in a cooling box. They tast absolutely great. I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Landry

customer_reviews.title: 50% chance
customer_reviews.text: Two stars given because I ordered two boxes. One was perfectly fine and the other was damaged and had signs of aging.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: she said they were great!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter in law,,,,, she said they were great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't like chocolate?
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. Got as a gift but wish they had been just milk chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bliss

product_meta.title: Godiva Chocolatier Assorted Dark Chocolate Truffles Gift Box, 12-Pieces, 8 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:12 Count (Pack of 1)Godiva premimum dark chocolate truffle gift box is meant to be shared; 12 chocolate balls with flavors such as salted caramel truffle, Aztec spice dark chocolate truffle ganache flavored with cinnamon, vanilla, and exotic spices and chocolate lava cake truffle featuring dark chocolate ganache with liquid fondant in a dark chocolate shell, dusted with powdered sugar. These chocolate truffles are great for birthday gifts, promotion gifts, thank you gifts, and more.
feature_bullets: EXQUISITE ASSORTED CHOCOLATE GIFT PACK: 12-pieces of delicious chocolate candies with rich taste in a fancy box

IRRESISTIBLY SMOOTH CHOCOLATE TRUFFLES: Features milk chocolate, dark chocolate and white chocolate shells with filling made of gourmet sea salt and chipotle, liquid fondant and crispy, crunchy toasted nuts
DESSERTS FOR CHOCOHOLICS: A sophisticated chocolate gift box for special moments, birthdays, a treat for chocolate lovers or to be shared at home with family and friends
COMPACT AND FANCY GIFT BOX: These Godiva truffles are individually stored in a special tray so you can eat and enjoy anytime, anywhere
INNOVATIVE PACKAGING: The temperature is monitored during shipment to ensure that your gourmet chocolate gift box arrives in perfect condition
